Package it.polimi.softeng.controller

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.controller.LobbyController
public class LobbyController extends Object
Controller class that handles a game lobby

  • Constructor Details

    • LobbyController

      public LobbyController(ArrayList<String> playerNames, boolean expertMode, String lobbyName, File saveFile) throws InvalidPlayerNumException
      This method is the constructor of the LobbyController class.
      Parameters:
      playerNames - ArrayList of String, names of the players of current game
      expertMode - boolean set to false if the game is in normal mode, set to true if the game is in expert mode
      lobbyName - String used to identify the lobby when creating messages to send to clients
      saveFile - File where the game state is saved
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNumException - when player number is outside the valid range (2-4)

    • LobbyController

      public LobbyController(String lobbyName, File saveFile) throws GameLoadException
      This method is the constructor of the LobbyController class when it's requested to load an existing game
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - String used to identify the lobby
      saveFile - File from which the state of the game is loaded
      Throws:
      GameLoadException - when there is any error with the loading of the state of the game from the file where it was saved

  • Method Details

    • closeFileStream

      public void closeFileStream()
      This method is used to close the Stream with the file where the state of the game is saved

      This method is used to save the state of the Game to the File represented by saveFileStream

    • checkConnectedTeams

      public boolean checkConnectedTeams(Set<String> connectedPlayers)
      Method that checks whether the amount of teams connects is more than one
      Parameters:
      connectedPlayers - the key-set of currently connected clients
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates the result of the check

    • skipPlayerTurn

      public void skipPlayerTurn(Player player)
      Method that skips a player's turn in the event that they are not connected currently
      Parameters:
      player - the player to skip

    • parseMessage

      public ArrayList<Message> parseMessage(Message inMessage) throws LobbyClientDisconnectedException, GameIsOverException
      This method is used to analyze the Message received by a Player and, if it's legal, to fullfill the Player's requests
      Parameters:
      inMessage - the Message sent by the Player
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Message, response the Messages of response to the Clients from the Server
      Throws:
      LobbyClientDisconnectedException - when a client disconnects
      GameIsOverException - when the game is over

    • calculateWinningTeam

      public Team calculateWinningTeam(Set<String> connectedPlayers)
      This method is used to calculate the winner Team when a GameIsOverException is raised
      Parameters:
      connectedPlayers - the currently still connected players, used to penalise teams with disconnected players
      Returns:
      Team the winning team
